verses.verse: A Song of Ascents. Behold, bless <WH1288> ye Jehovah <WH3068>, all ye servants <WH5650> of Jehovah <WH3068>, That by night <WH3915> stand <WH5975> in the house <WH1004> of Jehovah <WH3068>.
Lift up <WH5375> your hands <WH3027> to the sanctuary <WH6944>, And bless <WH1288> ye Jehovah <WH3068>.
Jehovah <WH3068> bless <WH1288> thee out of Zion <WH6726>; Even he that made <WH6213> heaven <WH8064> and earth <WH776>.
